qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve plataforma cloud permitindo ISVs desenvolverem extensões, caracterizando modelo de plataforma B2B com gestão de ecossistema de desenvolvedores.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Business Models for Cloud Computing: Experiences from Developing Modeling & Simulation as a Service Applications in Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: At one end of this chain, there exist the end-user companies from the manufacturing and engineering sector. In the CloudSME project, these companies are represented as two distinct categories: end-users who already utilize simulation technologies and end-users for whom simulation solutions are novel
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve dois segmentos de empresas manufatureiras e de engenharia (usuários existentes e novos de simulação), caracterizando modelo B2B empresarial de SaaS na nuvem.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Study on a Decentralized SaaS Business Model
qualitative_analysis.quote: local servers are belong to independent business entity. Hereafter, the term server refers to a business entity (e.g., a URL) that provides services in the context of decentralized SaaS model
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve modelo descentralizado de SaaS onde servidores locais são entidades de negócio independentes, caracterizando modelo de plataforma B2B distribuído.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Selection of the Proper Revenue and Pricing Model for SaaS
qualitative_analysis.quote: The software can be used in many different types of organizations, including financial institutions and government organizations. If customers had already invested in IT infrastructure and their own IT personnel, they saw traditional software licensing as a more attractive choice
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve software para diversos tipos de organizações (financeiras, governamentais) com preferências variadas por modelos de licenciamento, caracterizando modelo B2B híbrido cross-industry.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Service-Centric Business Model in Cloud Environment
qualitative_analysis.quote: Organizations are gaining profit from not only the potential benefits of cloud computing, but the practical opportunities induced from cloud environment to adapt their existing BM for satisfying all the customers' demands
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve organizações adaptando modelos de negócio para ambiente cloud visando atender demandas de clientes, caracterizando modelo B2B orientado a serviços na nuvem.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Designing Viable Multi-sided Data Platforms: The Case of Context-Aware Mobile Travel Applications
qualitative_analysis.quote: The intended population comprises young people who have a smartphone and who have a habit of traveling to cities. A convenience sample of Dutch students is used
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve app de viagem focado em jovens com smartphones que viajam para cidades, caracterizando plataforma B2C no mercado de apps móveis.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Economic and business perspectives on smartphones as multi-sided platforms
qualitative_analysis.quote: the BlackBerry, a device that allowed business executives to access their corporate email wirelessly from anywhere at any time
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve BlackBerry focado em executivos de negócios acessando email corporativo, caracterizando plataforma B2B para mercado empresarial.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Crushing Candy: The Free-to-Play Game in Its Connective Commodity Form
qualitative_analysis.quote: Casual games differ from the previous decades of so-called hard-core games because (1) their fiction preference tends to be positive, (2) casual games require less initial knowledge to play, and (3) they demand lower time investments
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve características de jogos casuais que demandam menor investimento de tempo e conhecimento, caracterizando modelo freemium B2C na indústria de games.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Effects of Freemium Strategy in the Mobile App Market: An Empirical Study of Google Play
qualitative_analysis.quote: For the Android consumers, Google Play is such a one-stop shop for thousands of Android apps. more than 60 percent of smartphone users rely heavily on the information provided by mobile app online marketplaces
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve Google Play como marketplace central para apps Android onde consumidores buscam informações, caracterizando plataforma B2C com modelo freemium.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Network Externalities, Incumbent's Competitive Advantage and the Degree of Openness of Software Start-Ups
qualitative_analysis.quote: relatively new entrants (software start-ups aged less than four years). Above 70 % of them consider the diffusion of incompatible proprietary solutions as the main barrier for the diffusion of OS solutions
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve startups de software enfrentando barreiras de efeitos de rede de soluções proprietárias incompatíveis, caracterizando desafios de startups open source.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
qualitative_analysis.quote: The second challenge comes from the diversity of SaaS clients, among which small and medium enterprises have been the most aggressive adopters
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto identifica PMEs como adotantes mais agressivos de SaaS, caracterizando foco no mercado SME B2B.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Clarifying the Value Elements of Business Models for Disturbance Management in Supply Chains
qualitative_analysis.quote: Logistic operators. Among logistic operators the need for management and analysis of transport problems is already identified, and it is an important part of companies' operations. In the logistic industry the companies search for competitive advantage especially with cost-effectiveness and quality
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve operadores logísticos buscando vantagem competitiva através de custo-efetividade e qualidade, caracterizando modelo B2B empresarial com precificação baseada em valor.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The Impact of Open Source Software Commercialization on Firm Value
qualitative_analysis.quote: for-profit firms collaborating with OSS communities. firms that aim to develop a commercial product jointly with a community do so mainly to receive design help from their potential future customers
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve empresas comerciais colaborando com comunidades OSS para co-criar produtos com futuros clientes, caracterizando modelo open source B2B com gestão de ecossistema.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: The relationship between Open Innovation and Strategy: data-driven analysis of the Mobile Value Services Industry
qualitative_analysis.quote: Mobile Network Operator (H3G, TIM, Vodafone, Wind) and Device Manufacturer (Apple, Nokia, Siemens) are the most detailed categories in the sample
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto identifica operadoras de rede móvel e fabricantes de dispositivos como categorias principais, caracterizando ecossistema de plataforma B2B no mercado móvel.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Open-Source Software Entrepreneurial Business Modelling
qualitative_analysis.quote: Our ultimate goal is to offer technology-minded founders a useful tool for managing the wide selection of business model components. Feedback was collected informally from bootstrap entrepreneurs, serial entrepreneurs
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve framework para fundadores empreendedores de tecnologia gerenciarem componentes de modelos de negócio open source, caracterizando foco em startups.

qualitative_analysis.article_title: Towards a better Understanding of the Dynamics of Platform as a Service Business Models
qualitative_analysis.quote: IT startups are dynamic in their early stages and thus will use new technologies and products compared to companies established before them. Platform modules are provided by independent software vendors (ISV)
qualitative_analysis.justification: O texto descreve startups de TI como early adopters de plataformas PaaS onde ISVs fornecem módulos, caracterizando ecossistema de plataforma B2B cloud focado em startups.
